divs: Sighting DetailsI was coming home from work and noticed a bright light in the northeast. Grabbedmy 10 X 25 binocs. and started watching it at about 245 AM at a dark nearbycorner where I could get a good view of it. It seemed to be stationary over theCatalina Mts. and noticed 1, 2, and one time 3 lights flanking both sides of thebright main one seeming to dance around the main one, sometimes merging into themain one or fading out and then back on. Even the main one would fade out thenback on as bright as Venus. Sometimes I would see two equally-bright lights dothis in the course of an hour. Called the Davis-Monthan AFB here in Tucson. Theysaid they were getting other calls about it but could not identify it
trends: There have been 173 other sightings in Tucson
There were no other sightings in Tucson on or around October 29th 2003
